Package com.deltasource.hotelmanagement.core

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deltasource.hotelmanagement.core.Manager
  • public class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for creating a manager with name and hotel

        Books a room by room number, accommodation and leaving dates, size, number of beds, guest name and guest id
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - the number of the room to be booked
        fromDate - the date of accommodation
        toDate - the date of leaving
        size - the booking period
        numberOfBeds - the number of beds
        guestName - the name of the guest
        guestId - the id of the guest
